gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] Paris' weather data shows some inconsistency. Meteoblue reports only a slight chance of rain (0.1-0.2") versus the baseline's 34% prediction. It's a bit like a bumblebee deciding whether to leave the hive or not, considering the unpredictable weather.
